name: Upperkut
description:
We are not an agency. We are not heavy, slow, rigid and hierarchical. We are what circulates, says, reads, sees, listens and creates. We are advertisers, designers, filmmakers, bloggers, web bearers, creators. We are not an agency. We are friendly, intelligent and different. We are Upperkut.
We were going through strategy, advertising creation, graphic design, social networks and content production (text, image and video) in order to mobilize and group citizens around common issues or interests.
